main event: Multiple glowing, blinking objects were observed moving and 'playing follow the leader' in the sky over Cincinnati, Ohio on November 26, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were described as blinking lights with tails, moving in a north-west-north direction.
The objects appeared to be playing 'follow the leader', moving about easily and disappearing completely at times.
The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
The witness estimated the size of the objects to be around 19-30 feet long.
The witness thought the objects could be 'spaceships from another planet'.
witnesses: a single witness, a male chief engineer
photographs: no photographs, only a sketch of the objects
